text: Ibrahim Yusri (20 April 1950 - 20 April 2015) was an Egyptian actor. He worked on movies, stage, and television. His best known movie was The Terrorist (1994). Yusri was born in Giza. He graduated from the Higher Institute for Dramatic Arts in 1975. Yusri died from kidney failure on his 65th birthday in Cairo. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1950 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:Egyptian movie actors Category:Egyptian television actors Category:Stage actors
title: Ibrahim Yusri
